short.am,ar,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: See the total install count and other metrics for all your Visual Studio Marketplace extensions with just one click
short.bg: Вижте общия инсталиран броене и други показатели за всичките си Визуални разширения Studio Marketplace само с едно кликване
short.ca: Veure la instal·lació total recompte i altres mètriques per a totes les extensions de Visual Studio mercat amb només un clic
short.de: Sehen Sie die Gesamtinstallationszählung und andere Metriken für alle Ihre Visual Studio Marketplace-Erweiterungen mit nur einem…
short.es: Ver el conteo de instalación total y otras métricas para todas las extensiones de Visual Studio Marketplace con un solo clic
short.fr: Voir le nombre total d'installations et d'autres métriques pour toutes vos extensions de Visual Studio Marketplace en un seul clic
short.it: Vedere il totale installazione conteggio e altre metriche per tutte le estensioni di Visual Studio Marketplace con un solo click
short.nl: Zie het totaal aantal te installeren en andere statistieken voor al uw Visual Studio Marketplace extensies met slechts een klik
short.pl: Patrz całkowita liczba instalacji oraz inne dane dla wszystkich rozszerzeń Visual Studio Marketplace za pomocą jednego kliknięcia
short.ro: A se vedea totalul de instalare conta și alte valori pentru toate extensiile Visual Studio Marketplace doar cu un singur clic
short.sv: Se totala installera räkningen och annan statistik för alla dina Visual Studio Marknads tillägg med bara ett klick
short.uk: Tek tıklama ile tüm Visual Studio Marketplace uzantılarınızın toplam yükleme sayısı ve diğer metriklerini görün

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to see the install count totals and other metrics for extensions in the Visual Studio Marketplace website https://marketplace.visualstudio.com.

Works for Azure Dev Ops (formerly VSTS) extensions, Visual Studio IDE extensions and VS Code extensions.

Shows total number of extensions, installs and reviews.

Includes number of reviews as a percentage of downloads.

Extension results are sortable and contains hyperlinks directly to each extension and to each publisher.

The results can be copied to clipboard with one click for easy pasting into Excel, etc.

Utterly beholden to the Microsfot DOM. Entirely not approved, endorsed or verified by Microsoft. Entirely unofficial and entirely not connected with Microsoft in anyway.
